name: DMXOPL v1.7
description: This is a GENMIDI patch for DMX for OPL2-OPL3 FM synthesis. This patch aims to remedy the "weak" default instruments to better match the Roland Sound Canvas, most notably the SC-55 and SC-88. Recommended minimum setup for no note-cuts is ZDoom 2.8.1 with MAME OPL2 emulator core, with 6 chips emulated.
